queries.description: Using nondistinct identifiers results in undefined behaviour.
queries.name: Identifiers declared in the same scope and name space shall be distinct

implementation_scope.description: This query considers the first 63 characters of identifiers as significant, as per C99 for nonexternal identifiers and reports the case when names are longer than 63 characters and differ in those characters past the 63 first only. This query does not consider universal or extended source characters.

RULE-5-2.title: Identifiers declared in the same scope and name space shall be distinct

queries.description: Declarations in multiple files can lead to unexpected program behaviour.
queries.name: An external object or function shall be declared once in one and only one file

RULE-8-5.title: An external object or function shall be declared once in one and only one file
